modName: Standalone Follower Ysgrette Iron-Heart or Aela Replacer
summary:
A Standalone female Nord follower called Ysgrette Iron-Heart

or an Aela replacer
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#00ff00][size=6][center][b][color=#00ff00][size=6][img]https://farm6.staticflickr.com/5565/14909233245_7fe5b25811_o.jpg[/img][/size][/color][/b][/center][/size][/color][/b][b][color=#00ff00][size=6]
About [/size][/color][/b]
Standalone female Nord Follower called Ysgrette Iron-Heart or an Aela replacer with nothing but her face and body edited. (Can't be used together)

[b]Body:[/b] 7B TBBP
[b]Voice Type:[/b] FemaleEvenToned
[b]Class:[/b] CombatRanger
[b]Level:[/b] Auto level 10-100
[b]Essential:[/b] No
[b]Protected:[/b] Yes
[b]Perks:[/b] None (I think followers are too powerful with perks)
[b]Location:[/b] See screenshots
[b]Default Equipment:[/b] Ancient Nord Armour (No Helmet), Iron sword, Hunting Bow, 100 Iron Arrows.

=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=

[b] [color=#00ff00][size=6]Requirements[/size][/color][/b]
Patch 1.9 (The last patch)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by [b]xp32[/b][/url]

=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=[color=#00ff00][size=6]

[b] Installation[/b][/size][/color]
[b]Manually:[/b] Copy and paste the meshes and textures folders and Ysgrette follower or Aela Replacer.esp into the Skyrim Data folder. Click "yes to all" if asked.

Or use Nexus Mod Manager.

:)

[b]NOTE:[/b] You can only use 1 of them. The Replacer and the Standalone follower use the same named .esp.
Do not ask me to make it so they can be used together.

=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=
[color=#00ff00][size=6]
[b] Uninstallation [/b] [/size][/color]
If Ysgrette is following, Dismiss her then leave the cell (go through a loading screen).

[b]Manually:[/b]
Data/meshes - then remove the folder named Ysgrette Iron-Heart
Data/meshes/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceGeom - then remove the folder named Ysgrette follower or Aela replacer.esp
Data/textures - then remove the folder named Ysgrette Iron-Heart
Data/textures/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceTint - then remove the folder named Ysgrette follower or Aela replacer.esp
Now remove Ysgrette FollowerÂ  or Aela Replacer.esp from the Skyrim Data Folder.

=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=
